name: FINANCIAL ADVISOR OF AMERICA
what_you_do: Financial Advisors of America assists individuals, families, and businesses in optimizing, protecting, and empowering their financial assets through proven strategies and educational resources.
who_you_serve: They serve individuals, families, businesses, and institutions seeking financial empowerment and resilience.
signature_programs: Proven Financial Security Blueprint, Home Equity Planning courses and educational webinars
bio: Bir Grewall is a celebrated financial strategist and advisor, quoted in national media, with a proven track record of helping clients avoid losses during financial crises.
business_focus: Financial Advisors of America assists individuals, families, and businesses in optimizing, protecting, and empowering their financial assets through proven strategies and educational resources. (financial advisory)
